tip.not-git-root: Current folder is not git root, please run the command after switch to a git folder.
tip.lost-config: Can't find the config file, please use dogit init to generate a config fileor use -n parameter to specify a config file.
tip.select-env: Please select the environment where you want to set the Tag.
tip.version-cannot-empty: The version number cannot be empty.
tip.msg-cannot-empty: The description information cannot be empty.
tip.enter-tag-is: The tag you want to set is
tip.confirm-exec: . Are you sure you want to start execution?
tip.last-tag: The last tag of the __ENV__ environment is
tip.excute-hook-start: Start to execute the hook script '__CMD__'.
tip.excute-plugin-start: Start to execute the hook plugin __PLUGIN__.
tip.excute-plugin-error: Error executing hook plugin __PLUGIN__, please check configuration.
tip.the-end: Congratulations on successfully setting the tag.
